'Odile Crick' (August 11, 1920 â€“ July 5, 2007) was a British artist best
known for her drawing of the double helix structure of DNA discovered by her
husband Francis Crick and James D. Watson in 1953. [http://www.nytimes.com/-
2007/07/30/science/30crick.html?ex=1343448000&en=f0da434e0cc6404b&ei=5088&partn-
er=rssnyt&emc=rss New York Times "Odile Crick, Who Drew Iconic Double Helix,
Dies at 86" July 30, 2007]
